fullplot: In this first sequel to The Return of the Living Dead, a group of kids discover one of the drums containing a rotting corpse and release the 2-4-5 Trioxen gas into the air, causing the dead to once again rise from the grave and seek out brains.
plot: Curious kids unearth the barrels that helped revive the dead of the first film, which proves the second time's an undead charm.
title: Return of the Living Dead II
